daily.question: Should we donate today's funds to local food banks?
daily.description: Donating to local food banks helps provide meals to those in need in our community.

daily.question: Should the app's interface be updated with a new color scheme?
daily.description: Updating the color scheme can refresh the app's look and make it more user-friendly.

weekly.question: Should we adjust the subscription price this week?
weekly.description: Adjusting the subscription price could make the app more accessible to a wider audience.

weekly.question: Should we add a new bill type for swapping?
weekly.description: Adding new bill types can provide users with more flexibility in managing their finances.

monthly.question: Should we revise our pricing model for premium features?
monthly.description: Revising the pricing model can offer better value and attract more premium users.

monthly.question: Which long-term charity partnership should we establish?
monthly.description: Partnering with charities long-term can amplify our impact and support meaningful causes.
